course_title: PMHNP Clinical Practice III: Advanced Integrative Clinical Practice
course_description: Students implement the role of psychiatric-mental health nurse practitioner. Focus is on assessment and intervention with persons/groups with and at risk for mental illness, and primary prevention. Legal issues, mental health policy, and interprofessional collaboration will be emphasized.
prerequisites: NRSG 840D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 2360, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: C. Nicholson, Status: Open
